trends: There have been 2 other sightings in St. Joseph
There were no other sightings in St. Joseph on or around December 14th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up early December 14th 2012 I knew the Gemidid meteor shower was going on so I went outside to watch it. The time was 2:5? Something in the morning. I seen about 7 meteors when my count was interrupted by 2 red orange glowing objects( which I believe to be apart of one unit). I am a Field Investigator for MUFON so I am aware of the UFO phenomenon. I got excited and fumbled for my binoculars. I tried to locate it twice with no luck. I was too nervous and shaky. I did not notice an outline of a body or structure. It disappeared into the distance and not over the horizon. I went inside afterwards and wrote everything down. The time was 3:15 am.
Summary: I was laying back watching the meteor show when I saw a glowing red orange object moving across the sky.
